mapper.select: SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, title, content, member_id AS memberId, image_path AS imagePath, attachment_path AS attachmentPath, attachment_name AS attachmentName FROM Notice ORDER BY notice_id DESC;

SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, title, content, member_id AS memberId, image_path AS imagePath, attachment_path AS attachmentPath, attachment_name AS attachmentName FROM Notice WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Notice ( title, content, member_id, image_path, attachment_path, attachment_name ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{memberId}, #{imagePath}, #{attachmentPath}, #{attachmentName} );
